title: {(;-;)} Looking for players for Key fragment / Chest earning. [URF and Normals]
body:
Looking for people to team with so that we have better odds of earning **key fragments/chests.**
Every time you or a member of your premade play well you have a chance of getting a **key fragment**.

+ Urf is more fun with a premade.

Add me in game if you're interested
~_Bespooks_
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: This is interesting. Add me please
